column1: Fiscal and monetary policy are providing strong support.
The economy is reopening, bringing stronger economic activity and job creation.
Unemployment was at 50year lows, and inflation remained under control.
Longstanding racial disparities in unemployment were narrowing, and many who had struggled for years were finding jobs.
Using our monetary policy tools, the Fed promotes maximum employment and price stability â€”two foundations of a strong, stable economy that can improve economic outcomes for all Americans.
We view maximum employment as a bro ad and inclusive goal.
